message: murneyhouse.ca is now live in beta. Most of the front end functionality, like calendar date/room selection, price calculation and request submission is in place and looks functional. The back end is being built and tested as you read this. For a casual visitor here - this site is in its MVP stage and most of the text/prices are place-holders for testing and will be updated in the finished site. Meantime, feel free to poke around and shoot us a message via contact form if you find any bugs.

The Rooms, Booking and Guest Hub pages are now up and running - feel free to poke around and let me know if you find any glitches. Also, testing the submission functionality for reviews and contact forms, G.
